ygData.subject: Re: What sort of price does bronze armour go for
ygData.msgSnippet: Thxs Martyn, glad to see us Brits on the list too! May explain why I always have trouble sellin via auction, just less ppl around for us to sell to.
ygData.messageBody:
Thxs Martyn, glad to see us Brits on the list too! May explain why I always
have trouble sellin via auction, just less ppl around for us to sell to.


>From: Martyn Adams <martyn-adams@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] What sort of price does bronze armour go for
>Date: Fri, 10 Dec 1999 11:47:59 +0000
>
>david howard wrote:
> >
> > From: "david howard" <howardd007@...>
> >
> > Just a quick query, is bronze worth auctioning, is there a demand for
>it,
> > and if so how much?
> >
> > Help appreciated as always
>
>I'm on Erollisi Marr and recently have picked up loads of medium bronze
>armour in Sol B. Before that I had picked up loads of small bronze in
>Unrest. Anyway I've been trying to sell this stuff off but not really
>had much success.. It's possible that because I'm from the UK and play
>UK evenings I only have a smaller playerbase to sell to but by the end
>of the evening the server is normally upto 1000-1300 players.. I've
>ended up giving the stuff away to low level DE clerics (I like to help
>DE clerics since there are so few of us).
>
>Personally it's just not worth the time I need to spend trying to sell
>the stuff.. perhaps if I collected enough and went to somewhere like
>Qeynos/Qeynos Hills/West Karana, I might be able to sell a lot of the
>medium bronze.. but again it's taking the time to do the trip..
>
> > Dyfed, Erollisi Marr
>
>Vinamin L'Crit
>Lvl 36 DE Cleric
>Erollisi Marr
><< text3.html >>
